title: Integrative Medicine
cleaned_text: What We Treat: How We Do It: Dr. Aly Cohen and Dr. Andrew Weil 2014 Graduation Ceremony Dr. Cohen received the Jones/Lovell Rheumatology Scholarship Working together, we will examine all aspects of your lifestyle — diet, exercise, sleeping habits, and stressors to uncover the true source of a health issue. We have a highly-trained nutritionist on-site to work with you to develop a more nutritious diet and healthier eating habits. This comprehensive approach to medicine takes into account the whole person — body, mind and spirit. Integrative medicine is a therapeutic relationship that makes use of all appropriate therapies, both conventional and alternative. Dr. Cohen works with patients in her Princeton, NJ office, and via telemedicine/video-conferencing,
